Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "SANTA FE" will begin its seventh round in Pro Mujer, as part of the Pan American Focal Center. The group consists of eight members, and is headed by a board of which Reyna is President. The members of the communal bank work in various types of businesses, including food sales, grocery sales, crafts, blanket sales, and transport services. 

The loan they are requesting will benefit these microentrepreneurs, Reyna being one of them. Reyna has been a member of Pro Mujer for five years, joining through the invitation of a promotional campaign by the institution. She currently has a business selling food, which she recently started with a little capital and the skills gained from childhood helping her mother. 
 
The loan she is requesting will be used to increase her capital to buy groceries at wholesale, which she would buy from the wholesale vendors in the city of El Alto. She would then use the supplies to make her food and sell in her retail space. This work will allow her to generate income to support her family, as she is married and has three children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the health services offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy grocery supplies wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement and bricks.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred is 46 years old and married with six children. Five attend school. He operates a retail shop mainly selling sugar, jerrycans, salt and rice among others in Hoima, Uganda. 

Fred receives additional income from a music system. He dreams of expanding his business and educating his children. He will use the loan to buy more sugar and rice to sell.

loans.use: to buy more sugar and rice to sell.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana María con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo saco adelante a su familia por la cual se siente muy orgullosa, continua siempre con su labor como mesera en un restaurante y su esposo trabaja como taxista, solicita el crédito para comprar materiales de construcción para hacer una segunda parte del muro de su vivienda para ir mejorando las condiciones y de paso brindar seguridad para la familia en el hogar.
texts.en:
Ana María is very proud that with much effort and hard work her family manages to support itself. She continues working as a waitress in a restaurant and her husband works as a taxi driver. 

She is requesting this loan to buy building materials to complete a second part of the wall around their house, in this way continuing to improve living conditions and offering better security to her family in their home.

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.ru:
Дилрабо по профессии медсестра. Она работает в центральной больнице своего района Вахш. Ей 37 лет. Дилрабо замужем, у нее сын и две дочки. Ее муж работает в местном банке. Старшая дочь студентка, а остальные дети школьники. Дочь Дилрабо пошла по ее стопам. Она в этом году поступила в медицинский колледж района Вахш и хочет в будущем как мать работать медсестрой и ухаживать за больными. Она умная и хорошо воспитанная девушка. Она очень хочет получить медицинский диплом и для этого будет учиться усердно. 
К сожалению, Дилрабо еще не оплатила за контракт дочери по причине нехватки финансов. Поэтому она обратилась за кредитом в размере 700 долларов США для оплаты за обучение дочери в колледже. Дилрабо надеется на вашу отзывчивость и доброту.
texts.en: Dilrabo is a nurse. She works at the central hospital of her district of Vakhsh. She is 37 years old. Dilrabo is married and has a son and two daughters. Her husband works at a local bank. The oldest daughter is a college student, and the rest of the children are school students. Dilrabo's daughter has followed in her footsteps. She was accepted to a medical college in the Vakhsh district and wants to work as a nurse, just like her mother, and take care of sick people. She is a smart and well-brought up young woman. She really wants to obtain a medical diploma and will study diligently for it. Unfortunately, Dilrabo has not yet paid for her daughter's tuition due to the lack of finances. This is why she requested a loan in the amount of 700 US dollars to pay for her daughter's college education. Dilrabo hopes for your responsiveness and kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's medical college education

loans.name: Gerarda

texts.en:
Gerarda thought she was in the right place when she joined the microfinance group of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. She decided to give it a try after she learned she could receive financial assistance for her chosen business. 

Gerarda has maintained her membership in good standing without records of default up to this day. She has taken several loans and all were paid in a timely manner. Recently, she took a loan to buy additional piglets for her chosen business. Gerarda wishes to continue managing her business effectively with the support of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La vida le dio una oportunidad para trabajar como empleado de una tienda de consumos diarios.  Era lo que ella esperaba, no sólo una puerta abierta sino lo que estaba detrás de esa puerta.  Y lo que encontró fue algo que definió lo que ella quería ser. De 33 años de edad casada originaria del departamento de Suchitepéquez tiene tres hijos el primero casado y tiene ya su familia, el segundo y tercero estudian en la comunidad donde viven, ella realiza un impresionante esfuerzo a pesar de su edad ella es una mujer emprendedora y que dice que nunca es demasiado tarde para empezar a desarrollar y tener una visión en el futuro.

La actividad que ella dignamente a desempeñado durante 6 años es la compraventa de abarrotería en la comunidad ya que es por medio de ella puede obtener un ingreso económico para su familia y una ganancia para mejora su condición de vida.

El uso respectivo que Maria le dará al préstamo que ella solicita es para compra de terreno que le están ofreciendo en su comunidad para dejar un mejor futuro para sus hijos y que tengan ellos con que desarrollarse en un futuro, la compra de un terreno es uno de las más grandes sueños de ella para poder dejar un bonito recuerdo para sus hijos.

Los sueños de ella es que las condiciones de su familia sean las adecuadas para un futuro y es por eso que quiere compra dos molinos de nixtamal instalarlas en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Life provided Maria the opportunity to work as employee of a store selling everyday goods.  This is what she had hoped for, not only an open door, but what was waiting behind that door.  And what she found was something that defined for her everything  she wanted to be.  Born in the department of Suchitequez, Maria is 33 years old, married,  and has three sons.  The oldest is married and already has a family; the second and third sons go to school in the community where they live.  She makes a great effort  as an enterprising woman despite her age and says it is never too late to begin to develop and have a vision for the future.   
 
The activity which she has carried out worthily for 6 years is the purchase and resale of groceries in the community.  This is the means by which she cann obtain a financial beginning for her family and earnings to improve their quality of life.    Maria will use the loan she is seeking to buy a piece of land which is for sale in her community, in order to provide a better future for her sons and  something for them to use in future development.  Purchasing  land is one of the greatest dreams Maria has, in order to leave a good inheritance for her sons.  Her dreams are that her family's life conditions be appropriate in the future and that is why she wants to buy two corn mills to install in her community.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land

loans.name: Dúo Lesly Group

texts.es: Dúo Lesly Doña Ana sigue  siendo la líder de  este dúo,  doña Ana quien tiene 37 años de edad y es madre de dos hijos de edades de 19 y 13 año. en su domicilio doña Ana cuenta con su negocio de venta de consumo diario, medicina, venta de variedades y venta de ropa de bebe. A Dios gracias ya tiene en su negocio 17 años, doña Ana manifiesta que ahora también hace eventos especiales la preparación de comida, que gracias a Dios  recibió varios cursos de cocina y ahora está viendo el resultado de su esfuerzo, esto motiva a doña Ana a seguir trabajando y ver a su hijo mayor quien cursa su carrera universitaria.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles para la venta.
texts.en: Ana keeps being the leader of the "Dúo Lesly" Group. Ana is 37 years old and the mother of two children, who are 19 and 13. In her house Ana has a business selling items of daily consumption, medicines, diverse items and baby clothes. Thanks God Ana has been working in this business for 17 years already. Ana says that now she also does catering, preparing food for special events. She took various cooking classes and she is now seeing the results of her effort. This motivates Ana to keep on working and see her oldest son studying a college career. She is requesting a loan to buy food products to sell.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: Haide

texts.en:
Haide is married and she works hard to support her family.

Haide has a business selling spices in the Philippines, and also earns income from farming sugarcane. Haide is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF in order to buy more stock of spices to sell in her food stall.

Haide has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of spices to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Alfredo De Jesus

texts.es: Alfredo de 44 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su hija de 22 años de edad y su grupo familiar. Él es un hombre admirable que desde hace más de 15 años pone todo su esfuerzo en su trabajo de motorista para sostener la economía de su hogar, además de apoyar a su hija que ya es una joven mayor de edad que al igual que su padre lucha por superarse. Alfredo es un hombre humilde y sencillo, pero con grandes deseos de mejorar por lo que desea iniciar con la reparación del techo de su vivienda y es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: madera, clavos y lamina galvanizada para reparar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Alfredo is 44 years old. He lives in his own house, together with his 22 year old daughter and his family. He is an admirable man who for more than 15 years has put all his effort in his job as a driver in order to support the household finances; and also to support his daughter, who is already an adult and like her father is struggling to move ahead. Alfredo is a humble and simple man, but with great wishes to improve. Therefore, he wants to start repairing the roof of his house. To do this he is requesting a loan to FUSAI to buy: wood, nails and galvanized metal sheet to repair the roof of his house.

loans.use: to invest in: wood, nails and galvanized metal sheet to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tables, stands, bridal arches and aisle stands for wedding rentals

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 43 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Imelda is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Imelda has been farming rice for four years, and she also earns income from weaving native products.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Lucia Misterio

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Santa Ana, conocida por sus bellos paisajes y por sus hermosos balnearios de agua dulce que son muy visitados por muchos turistas, cada 15 días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nuevos Caminos.
En este lugar vive la señora Lucia, tiene 65 años de edad, hace varios años quedo viuda y de esta relación tuvo 9 hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive con ella. 
Doña Lucia con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante en el hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y bisuterías, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan de alguna prenda. Trabaja todos los días, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Tiene 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y bisuterías. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños tener buena salud y salir adelante.
texts.en:
In the city of Santa Ana, which is known for its beautiful landscapes and pretty pools of fresh water that are visited by many tourists, the members of the community bank Nuevos Caminos meet every 15 days. 

65-year-old Lucia lives in this place. She has been a widow for several years and has 9 adult children from this relationship. One of her adult children still lives with her. Lucia sells all types of clothing and jewelry in the hopes of earning something on her own and helping her familly get ahead. She sells door-to-door and also sells from her home, where clients go when they need a specific garment. She works every day, gives credit to her customers, and charges them every 15 days. She has done this for 5 years and it is going well. She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise including pants, blouses, t-shirts, and jewelry. '

She has been in the community bank since its beginning and she likes it because the loans fund her business. Her dream is to be healthy and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and jewelry.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is from Dulag, Leyte. She has been a rice farmer for 30 years. In addition to that, she also sell nipa shingles. Her work was instrumental in raising her four children, when they were young. She is asking for a loan to buy farm inputs, such as fertilizer and seeds, to maintain her farm.

Nenita hopes that her rice yield will be better, so she can provide a comfortable life for her family and so that her youngest, who is 12 years old, can continue going to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente tiene 21 años de edad, el es una joven emprendedor y decidido para poder superar en la vida, el no se deja vencer por los obstáculos que la vida le pone sino el alcanza todo sus mentas y sueños, el está en espera de su primer hijo ya que su esposa tiene 6 meses de embarazo.
	
El obtiene sus ingresos económicos por medio de la producción de bananos en la comunidad donde el vive, sus padres le enseñaron dicha actividad desde hace 8 años, el realiza la venta de su producto en el mercado y en los alrededores de su comunidad y así tener un ingreso económico para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El uso respectivo que le dará al crédito es para el mantenimiento de banano, ya que para el es de mucha importancia que sus plantas de bananos produzcan frutos de primera calidad y así no perder a los clientes con que el cuenta.

Una de las grandes aspiraciones de el es la siembra de más plantas de bananos y ver crecer a su hijo y para un fututo ponerlo a estudiar  y convertirse en profesionales en la vida y la construcción de su vivienda para tener una condición de vida adecuada.
texts.en:
Vicente is a 21-year-old young entrepreneur who is determined to better himself in life. He does not let life's obstacles defeat him, however he reaches all his goals and dreams. He is awaiting his first child, as his wife is 6 months pregnant.

He makes an income by producing bananas in the area where he lives, which his parents taught him eight years ago. He sells his product in the market on the outskirts of his community and this way he has an income to improve his family's living conditions.

He will use the loan to maintain banana trees, since it is very important to him that his banana plants produce high quality fruit so that he does not lose the customers he relies on.
	
His biggest aspirations are to plant more banana plants, to see his son grow up and study in the future to be come successful, and to build his house to have adequate living conditions.

loans.use: to maintain banana trees.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Leonisa works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from charcoal-retailing and pig-fattening businesses.

Leonisa is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF. She will use the loan in order to purchase more groceries to sell, for her general store business.

Leonisa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Genelyn

texts.en:
Genelyn is 36 years old, married, and working hard to support her family. She has a business, buying and selling dry goods, in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan amount to purchase additional dry goods to sell. She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan, to further build her business.

Genelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional dry goods to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a high-quality breed dairy cow.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 46 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 2 hijos de 19 y 10 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que todos los días se esfuerza para sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que es consciente que esta responsabilidad es solo de ella, y es por ello que pone más empeño en su trabajo como vendedora de pollos en un rancho cercano a su vivienda. Dora desea cercar su propiedad y cambiar el techo de la cocina de su vivienda y es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: alambre de púas, postes de cemento, lamina y madera para cercar su propiedad y cambiar el techo de la cocina.
texts.en:
Dora is 46 years old and she lives in her own home along with her two children who are ten and nineteen years old. She is a woman who struggles each day to support her children and she knows that it is her sole responsibility. For this reason, she puts more effort into her job where she sells chickens at a ranch near her home. 

Dora hopes to fence in her property and to change the ceiling in the kitchen of her home. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy: barbed wire, cement posts, sheet metal and wood to enclose her property and to change the kitchen ceiling.

loans.use: to buy: barbed wire, cement posts, sheet metal and wood to fence in her property as well as to change the ceiling in the kitchen.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 51 years old and lives in San Roque, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with four children now at their adult and school age. 

Alma earns a living from selling ready-to-wear (RTW) clothes and cosmetics, particularly AVON and Natasha Products. She has been doing this for more than five years already, to support her family as the sole bread winner. Alma earns approximately PHP 1,000 each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used for purchasing additional stocks of RTW’s and cosmetics particularly dresses, shirts, pants, perfumes, lotions, colognes, lipsticks and other beauty products for sale. Alma has been a member of PMPC for almost three years. In the future, Alma hopes to open a boutique for the display of all her RTW and beauty products.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of cosmetics and ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Grupo Pochol 2 Group

texts.es:
Diego tiene 44 años de edad soltero, el es una hombre emprendedor y decidido para poder superar en la vida, el no se deja vencer por los obstáculos que la vida le pone sino el alcanza todo sus mentas y sueños, el tiene cinco hijos que mantener el primero ya trabaja para ayudar en los recursos económicos de su familia y los  últimos cuatros  son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad. (Diego es la que se encuentra de 1ra de izquierda a derecha en la fotografía)	

El obtiene sus ingresos económicos por medio de la producción de bananos en la comunidad donde el vive, sus padres le enseñaron dicha actividad desde hace 30 años, el realiza la venta de su producto en el mercado y en los alrededores de su comunidad y así tener un ingreso económico para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El uso respectivo que le dará al crédito es para el mantenimiento de banano, ya que para el es de mucha importancia que sus plantas de bananos produzcan frutos de primera calidad y así no perder a los clientes con que el cuenta.

El es un buen ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de personas se unieron a Diego para emprender ellos también la producción de bananos par que mejoren las condiciones de vida de su familia.

Una de las grandes aspiraciones de el es la siembra de más plantas de bananos y ver crecer a sus hijos en el campo de la educación y convertirse en profesionales en la vida y construir casas para sus hijos para que ellos tengan las condiciones de vida adecuada.
texts.en: Diego is 44 years old and single. He is an enterprising man who is determined to move ahead in life. He does not let himself be defeated by the obstacles in life, but he strives to fulfill his goals and dreams. He has five children to support. The oldest one already works to help with the financial resources of his family. The other four children are excellent students at the school in their community (Diego is the the first one on the left of the photo). He gets his financial income by producing bananas in the community where he lives. His parents taught him this 30 years ago. He sells his product at the market and in the surroundings of his community in order to have an income to improve his family's quality of life. He will use the loan to maintain his banana plants, because it is very important that his plants produce first quality fruits and that he does not lose his customers. He is a good role model in his community and this is why a group of people joined Diego to also start producing bananas to improve their families' life conditions. One of his greatest wishes is to grow more banana plants and to see his children grow in the education field and become professionals; and to build houses for his children so that they have adequate life conditions.

loans.use: to maintain the banana plants.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius lives in Hoima, in Uganda. He is aged fifty-two and married. He has six children, and four of them attend school. He does business in a retail shop, mainly buying and selling sugar, rice, and salt. He is also engaged in providing transport services and earns additional income from rentals. He has dreams of expanding his business, in order to earn more profits. He will use the loan facility to buy more sugar and salt to sell at his shop.

loans.use: to buy more sugar and salt to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fishing gear such as nets, lead weights, hooks, crab traps, and others.

loans.name: Gloria Natividad

texts.es: Gloria de 43 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 3 hijos de 18, 10 y 5 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que gracias a su esfuerzo y tenacidad ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos, por medio de su pequeña venta de mariscos la cual realiza todas las mañanas después de mandar a sus a la escuela. Gloria es una mujer abnegada que siempre busca lo mejor para sus hijos y es por ello que desea reparar el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para reparar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Gloria is 43 years old. She lives in her own house together with her 3 children who are 18, 10 and 5 years old. She is a woman, who by her effort and tenacity has been able to bring up her children thanks to her small business selling seafood. She works every morning after sending her children to school. Gloria is a selfless woman who always looks for what is best for her children, and for this she wants to repair the roof of her house because it is in bad condition. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to FUSAI to buy: galvanized metal sheet, wood and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.use: to invest in: galvanized metal sheet, wood and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma, a 52-year-old married mother of three from Concepcion, Iloilo, has been engaged in a fishing business with her husband for more than five years now. She is requesting a loan to buy new fishing nets and a boat engine. These purchases will enable her and her husband to improve their catch.

In the future, Thelma hopes to make their fishing business more profitable and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and a boat engine

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a 46-year-old, married lady with six children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She is a retailer and a farmer. She faces a challenge of low capital, but hopes that she can become a wholesaler. Juliet needs a loan to buy general merchandise like sugar, soap, and posho to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like sugar, soap, and posho to sell.

loans.name: Yuly

texts.en:
Yuly is 41 years old, married, and has three children who are in school. She is in the agricultural business of farming rice in the Philippines. Yuly has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional rice seeds and fertilizers for her farm.

Yuly has been farming rice for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Yuly would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional rice seeds and fertilizers for her farm.

loans.name: Obadiah

texts.en:
Obadiah, 31, enjoys spending time with his animals on the farm. The father of four did not know he will have such a deep connection with animals 13 years ago when he started farming in Itibo village, a popular banana-growing region in Kenya. His primary income sources are milk, tea, and profits from a small time side-business.

Obadiah is seeking a KES 30,000 loan from Kiva lenders to venture into poultry farming. Poultry farming is a big business with the ever-growing hospitality industry in the region. Hotels and educational institutions create a huge demand for eggs and meat. Obadiah is constrained financially to seize this great opportunity. He is banking on online angels to make this dream a reality.

The money he will make from selling eggs will repay the loan. Profits will be ploughed back to meet business expenses. Obadiah reckons that the income that he will generate from this loan investment will change his family life forever.

loans.use: to purchase poultry

loans.name: Minerva

texts.en:
Minerva works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business buying and selling seaweeds in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional seaweeds to sell.

Minerva has been in this business for 20 years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seaweeds to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy: galvanized metal sheet and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma has been running a general store to make a living. She has been in this business for seven years, and she earns very well from this. Her previous loan, which she used for purchasing goods, has been fully repaid. She was determined in working on it, because she wants to improve it, for she wants to ensure a better source of income for the family.

To increase her sales, she has taken a new loan. She will use this loan to purchase additional products to sell at her retail store, like dried fish, vegetables, and canned goods. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell, like dried fish, vegetables, and canned goods.

loans.name: Hamam

texts.en:
Hamam is 34 years old and lives with his wife and two sons in Gaza. He has been working as a barber for fifteen years. He is one of the people affected by the last war in Gaza. His house was partially destroyed, and he would like to repair it.

For this reason, he has requested a loan from Ryada to rebuild the kitchen, install pipelines, and buy glass and planks for renovating his home.

Hamam is very grateful to everyone who helps him. He hopes to be able to be back to his normal life again with his family and to provide good living conditions for his children.

loans.use: to rebuild his kitchen, install pipelines, and buy glass and planks for renovating his home.

loans.name: Imasumac Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Maria Carmen, la socia  tiene 46 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, perfumes entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez vende ropa para sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de perfumes entre otros.
Los socios  se sienten agradecidos  por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios se dedican a la lavanderia, diseños de interiores, librería, trabajadores de empresa privada.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the IMASUMAC communal bank, which is located in Cusco district and Cusco department. 

Member Maria Carmen is 46 years old, single, and has two children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling beauty products like creams and perfume, among others. She has been operating this business for quite some time, and it works well for her because of the determination she puts into her work every day. She also sells clothes for her clients who request it. She wants to continue working and in this way continue supporting her family. 
She is requesting a loan to buy perfumes and other products. 

The group members are grateful for the loans offered and commit to paying back their established installments. Other members run a laundry, a bookstore, design interiors, and work in private companies. The members in the thumbnail photo asked permission to arrive late at the meeting because of their work.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and other products.

loans.name: Jomar

texts.en:
Jomar is 32 years old, single, and lives at Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. He finds passion in raising pigs in his own backyard. He is happy that he does his hobby, and at the same time earns a living. 

Through Paglaum MPC, he obtained the capital to purchase his original piglets and feed. Now, he requests a loan of 3,000 PHP to buy additional bags of feed. 

He really hopes and prays that his business will grow and benefit his family. Someday, he wants to buy a motorcycle for transportation.

loans.use: to buy additional bags of feed.

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
A married parent of one child, Arlyn works hard to support her family. She has a general store in the Philippines and earns additional income from pig fattening.

Arlyn successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more items like canned goods, soap, shampoo, chips, etc. to sell in her general store.

Arlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like canned goods, soap, shampoo, chips, etc.

loans.name: Elick

texts.en:
Elick is a 30-year-old farmer who wants to start commercial poultry farming in Nyagokiani, a village in Nyamira, Kenya. The father of four has been in the farming business for over a decade, keeping poultry and cattle and growing tea and other crops. 

Elick enjoys farming. The few poultry he currently keeps are enough to supply his family with eggs all year. The few times they ended up with more than they wanted, they sold door to door or at the farm's gate.  

Elick is seeking a loan to venture into commercial poultry farming. He is planning to use the chickens for eggs and meat, and he will raise his own chicks. The male chicks will be raised for meat, while the female will be kept for egg production, to be sold at the market.

The income Elick makes from this investment will not only go toward loan repayment but also business and personal expenses. In this life, he strives to provide the best for his family in order to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase poultry

loans.name: Lightson

texts.en: Lightson is a 24-year-old, married man. He has four children and lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a motorcyclist and a farmer. He faces challenges from weather changes. Besides that, he has hopes of buying another motorcycle, to boost his income. Lightson needs a loan to buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty lives in Hoima, Uganda .She is twenty-seven years old and is mothering two children, both attending school. 

She deals in cosmetics, particularly buying and selling of perfumes for men and women, lotions, and baby jellies, among others. She hopes to develop her business and improve her standard of living. 

She will use the loan facility to buy more cosmetics items to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics items to sell.

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Most of Kenya’s young people struggle to make their way in the world because of unemployment and lack of capital. This is not true for Samwel, who is based in the Kisii area of Kenya, and is a father of seven lovely children. He has been practicing mixed farming for the past two years. He has managed to earn a decent income. His primary source of income has been milk, eggs, crops and some personal business he engages in, to make that extra coin. Samwel enjoys the farming lifestyle. He has a connection with farm animals that goes deep, to the extent that he names each of them. 

He has aspirations of expanding his dairy farm, but due to financial constraints, he has been unable to do so until now. From Kiva lenders, Samwel is kindly requesting KES 31,200 to purchase a high yielding dairy cow. This cow will boost milk production on the farm. As a result, he will have more quantity for both consumption and sales. With the money from the additional sales, he will be able to service his loan on time. With increased income from the loan, Samwel plans to spend money to settle the high farming costs of production. Many farmers compromise quality because of the high cost of inputs. However, with increased income, Samwel will not take such measures. In the long run, his family will realize an improved standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en:
Abdallah is a 22-year-old single man from Khan Younis. He lives with his mother and brothers in a small, simple house. His mother is an employee in the public sector, where she earns a low income.

Abdallah is a student in a local collage, where he studies to become a medical secretary. He would like to finish his studies and find a job in the future.

Abdallah took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, Abdallah will be able to write his reports and do his homework easily.

Abdallah appears in the photo with his new laptop

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Ismael Jose

texts.es: Ismael es un joven de 28 años, estudio la carrera de Diseño Gráfico, pero por el  desempleo en el país labora como cajero en una farmacia, gracias a este trabajo mantiene sus gastos principales y los de sus dos hermanos de quienes se hizo cargo junto a su madre quienes no cuentan con el apoyo económico de su padre, Ismael solicita el apoyo de crédito para poder mejorar las condiciones de su humilde vivienda para brindarle a su familia un techo digno, comprara los materiales para hacer las paredes las cuales en la actualidad son de madera y se están carcomiendo.
texts.en:
Ismael is a young man 28 years old. He studied Graphic Design, but he works as a cashier at a pharmacy. Thanks to this job, he is able to cover his basic expenses and those of his two brothers. He is responsible for them, along with his mother, because they do not receive any financial support from his father.

Ismael is applying for a loan in order to improve the conditions of his humble house, to give his family a proper roof. He will buy the materials to build the walls, which are currently made of wood and are getting eaten away.

loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seasonal winter clothing for her business.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
María Mercedes tiene 64 años de edad, es conviviente, vive con su esposo, en casa propia, en una comunidad pequeña en la zona rural de Nueva Arica y goza con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio; y está ubicada en el distrito de Nueva Arica, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

María Mercedes se dedica a la actividad de crianza y venta de cerdos, desde hace más de 10 años de antigüedad en el negocio, el mismo que se encuentra en la parte posterior de su domicilio. María Mercedes solicita préstamo para la compra de cerdos y alimento de engorde balanceado para los mismos; y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio aumentando su stock para poder atender toda la demanda de su público consumidor. Lo que en un corto plazo se verá reflejado en mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende en una mejora de su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Mercedes is 64 years old and lives with her husband in a small community in the rural area of Nueva Arica.  She comes with good personal and professional references from her neighbors.  It’s basically an agricultural community and the people raise and sell livestock.  It’s located in the Nueva Arica district in the province of Chiclayo and the Lambayeque region in northern Peru.

Maria Mercedes raises and sells pigs and has done so for more than 10 years.  The business is located behind her house.  Maria Mercedes is asking for a loan to buy pigs and feed.  This will allow her to continue to work and increase her stock so that she can meet her consumer demand.  She expects a short term increase in profits and income and an improvement in her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed.

loans.name: Rhodora

texts.en:
Rhodora is a 42-year-old, married woman, and a mother of two children, from Concepcion, Iloilo. Rhodora has been engaged in a fishing business with her husband for more than seven years. This is the source of their income.

Rhodora is asking for a loan to buy more fishing nets, lead weights, hooks, and crab traps. Through this, she and her husband will be able to improve their catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy more fishing nets, lead weights, hooks, and crab traps.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a modern dairy unit.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 50 years old and married with eight children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business directly selling a personal collection in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of personal products to sell.

Anita has borrowed and repaid 11 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the business selling the personal collection for five years, and also earns an income from buying and selling rice. Anita aspires to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of personnal products to sell

loans.name: Leny

texts.en:
Leny is 34 years old and married with three children, all of whom attend in school. She works very hard to provide for them. Leny runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Leny has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and school supplies.  In the future, Leny would like to save enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en: Vincent used the previous loan to buy a grass-cutting machine. He has been a bricklayer for 13 years, and this has enabled him to pay his children’s school fees. He started as a farmer and later switched to brick making, but being an ambitious man, he wanted to diversify his income sources and venture into grass cutting for schools and hospitals. He has now asked for a loan to pay for labor and to buy sand for his house construction.

loans.use: to pay for labor and to buy sand for his house construction.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa Emilia es una Sauceña nacida y criada en este maravilloso pueblo donde se casó y procreó dos hijos los cuales estudian la primaria.
Se desempeña como profesora de primaria en una escuela de la localidad donde tiene más de 10 años de laborar.
En conjunto con su esposo han hecho gran esfuerzo de comprar primero un solar como generalmente se les dice en Nicaragua y luego han ido poco a poco construyendo su casita con la ayuda de los préstamos, por lo cual se siente muy agradecida por este apoyo incondicional de Kiva y Ceprodel donde ha obtenido varios créditos.
En este momento tiene la necesidad de un financiamiento porque le urge terminar de cerrar la cocina de la vivienda, ya que la temporada de lluvia está fuerte y se le mete el agua.
Con esto pretende adquirir ladrillos, cemento, zinc y perlines.
Confía en Dios que los inversionistas de Kiva y Ceprodel apoyen su solicitud para poder llevar a cabo su inversión.
texts.en:
Rosa Emilia is from El Sauce, born and raised in this wonderful town, where she got married and had two children, who are in elementary school. She works as an elementary school teacher in a local school where she has been working for more than 10 years.

Together with her husband, they have made great efforts to buy a plot of land (a "solar," as it is generally called in Nicaragua), and then build a small house on it little by little, with the help of loans. They are very grateful for this unconditional support from Kiva and Ceprodel, where they have taken out several loans.

Right now, she needs a loan because she needs to close the kitchen of the house urgently, since the rainy season is strong and water comes in. With the loan, she plans to buy bricks, cement, corrugated metal roofing, and roof beams.

She trusts in God that Kiva and Ceprodel investors will support her application to be able to see her investment through.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, corrugated metal roofing, and roof beams.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a room in her home.

loans.name: Aysar

texts.en:
Aysar is a 22-year-old single man from Qabatiya, a village near Jenin City. His father is a worker with a low income. Three years ago, Aysar started his own business, which is a farm for raising chickens. He sells the meat in the local market.

Aysar requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more chicks for his farm. By taking this loan, Aysar will be able to increase the farm's productivity and also his income.

Aysar appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more chicks for his farm

loans.name: Afoua

texts.fr: Afin d'acheter des céréales et des charbons de bois au marché pour revendre à ses clients, Afoua sollicite un troisième crédit à WAGES. Le profit lui permettra d'agrandir son stock et contribuer aux besoins de la famille. Elle est mariée à un retraité et mère de famille. Elle est âgée de 60ans.
texts.en:
In order to purchase grain and charcoal at the market to resell to her customers, Afoua is requesting her third loan from WAGES. The income she earns will allow her to increase her stock of merchandise and contribute to her family's needs.

Afoua is married to a retiree and is the mother of the family. She is 60 years of age.

loans.use: to purchase grain and charcoal for resale

loans.name: Drocella

texts.en: Drocella is 33 years old. She is married with one child who is 2 years old. She sells foodstuffs and has been selling in a business for the past 10 years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more groundnuts, beans and maize to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumptions.

loans.use: to buy more groundnuts, beans, and maize to sell.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en:
She is Sabina, 51, resident of  Silang Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Jose, a "taho" vendor. She and her husband work hard to provide income to support their aging parents and meet their daily basic needs.

Sabina has been in the food vending business for seven years already. She cooks gallons of taho (cooked soya beans with syrup) and her husband sells them by the cups at a profit. "Taho" is a favorite food of Filipinos--the average Filipino household buys it by the cup from a vendor who regularly passes by in front of the houses in the villages. It is freshly cooked and warm and is usually eaten for breakfast. The local residents in their community are her regular customers.

To help her continue with her business, she would like to apply for a PHP 10,000 loan, which she will use to buy the raw ingredients like soya beans and sugar to cook her taho. She is positive for a good turnout for her business. Their customers are always looking forward to buying and eating her yummy warm taho. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to her.

Sabina dreams to have a stall of her own to sell her taho to grow her business. She prays that she and her husband will live to stay healthy and happy in their old age. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for soya beans for her "taho" vending business.

loans.name: Mary.

texts.en:
Mary used the previous loan to buy clothes to sell. Her challenges include increased competition, and weather changes, especially rainy seasons, which hinder customers from coming to buy. Her customers are mainly seasonal customer.

She has continued with the same business of selling clothes. She is aiming at generating more profits and a good retirement, as she is running out of age. Mary has asked for a loan to buy more secondhand clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a 50-year-old, hardworking man with six children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer, rearing animals and growing food crops like sugar cane. He faces a challenge of limited capital. However, he desires to educate all of his children to higher levels of learning. Patrick needs a loan to buy poultry feed.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Nuuru

texts.en:
Nuuru is a 44-year-old married man with two children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer who grows food crops like rice, and at the same time has a shop that sells electrical appliances. His main challenge is limited capital. 
Nuuru desires to complete his residential house and for that, he requests a loan to pay for labor of the construction of his residential house.

loans.use: to pay for labor of the construction of his residential house

loans.name: Margret

texts.en: Margret used the previous loan to purchase sodas and beers to sell. She has a retail shop and a bar and she also does outside catering. She has five years of experience in such business. She faces challenges of inadequate capital to expand the business. Margret needs this loan to purchase beers and sodas to sell.

loans.use: to purchase sodas and beers to sell.

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 39 anos de idade, solteira mãe de 1 filho menor de idade que frequenta a escola, responsabiliza-se pela sua sobrinha que vive em sua casa.
Trabalha no Tribunal como Auxiliar Administrativo a mais de 6 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa e na sua obra. Com empréstimo solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento, pedra e outro que for necessário. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende dar continuidade com os estudos e garantir o ensino do filho até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Marta was born in Namaacha in the province of Maputo. She is 39 years old. She is single and has one son, who is in school. She also takes care of her niece, who lives with her.
She has worked at the courthouse as an administrative assistant for more than six years, and she uses her salary to cover household expenses and construction costs. She will use this loan to continue the work on her home, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, stone, and anything else that is needed. This is her second loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she hopes to continue her studies and be able to pay for her son to pursue higher education.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, stone, and anything else that is needed.

loans.name: Salome

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Xai-Xai Província de Gaza tem 49 anos de idade solteira mãe de 2 filhas maiores de idade, responsabiliza-se pelos seus 5 netos dos quais 3 vivem em sua casa.
Trabalha como jardineira a mais de 8 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o empréstimo solicitado pretende concluir a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento e tinta. Este é o seu 11ª empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende garantir o ensino dos seus netos e mais tarde adquirir uma viatura.
texts.en:
Salome was born in Xai-Xai in the province of Gaza. She is 49 years old. She is married and has two adult daughters. She is financially responsible for her five grandchilren, three of whom live with her.
She has been working as a gardener for more than eight years. She uses what she earns to pay for household expenses. She will use this loan to continue the work on her home, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and paint. This is her eleventh loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she hopes to pay for her grandchildren's education and then buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, and paint.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase tobacco farm equipment

loans.name: Atanasi

texts.en: Atanasi is a 40-year-old man with five children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer and a retailer. He faces a challenge of limited capital, but he has hopes of educating all of his children to higher levels of learning. Atanasi needs a loan to plant rice for commercial purposes.

loans.use: to plant rice for commercial purposes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries to sell.

loans.name: Willy

texts.en:
Willy, 66 years old, is one of the millions of farmers who make a living raising dairy cattle. He is based in Chepkemel, a remote village in the rural town of Kericho. He has a wife and 6 children, and wants to lay a good foundation for his family and grandchildren to come. This is why he started farming and has been practicing mixed farming for the past 30 years. His primary source of income is milk, tea, and some personal businesses.

Willy is very passionate about dairy farming and always says, “dairy farming is close to my heart”. He has nicknamed his dairy cow “Chemunge”. Dairy farming in Kenya has seen an upsurge in growth and milk prices in the recent past have skyrocketed. This translates to increased earnings for farmers. Willy, being a very hardworking and visionary farmer, wants to take advantage of the ready market; therefore he kindly seeks a loan from Kiva lenders via Juhudi Kilimo to buy a good quality breed of a dairy cow. Willy has already decided what type of dairy breed he requires and, because of the immense knowledge he has on preparing hay, his cows will never lack animal food which will ensure increased milk production. 

Willy projects that, through the loan, his cow will be giving out more than 10 liters a day. Marketing the milk will never be a challenge because he will be selling it directly to the market as well as to big dairy-processing firms and will result in increased earnings. He does not worry too much about competition because there is a ready market for milk. Through the loan, Willy has also planned to package the milk to further improve his income. He also plans to use accumulated profits he will gain to construct a biogas digester that he will use in cooking and other domestic chores.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 27 years old. She is married. She sells foodstuffs and has been working in a business for the past five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more banana, potatoes, and cassava for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: To buy more banana, potatoes, and cassava for sale.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a 24-year-old entrepreneur living in the Wedza District of Zimbabwe. She volunteers in schools in her community offering guidance and support to students by teaching them life skills. 

Over the last year, Lucy has grown her poultry business to its current capacity; producing about 90 broiler birds every 6 weeks and selling them to local residents. She started the business in 2013 when her family started facing financial difficulties. Poultry production is a thriving business in her community. Lucy would very much like to increase her sales and become a supplier to major supermarkets. Lucy will use the Kiva loan to purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production. This will enable her to have more profits to enable her to support her family.

loans.use: To purchase more broiler chicks and chick feeds

loans.name: Amandio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 31 anos de idade vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos menores de idade apenas 2 é que frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus pais que vivem na Matola.
É proprietário de um estabelecimento comercial a mais de 4 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o empréstimo solicitado pretende aumentar o volume de criação de frangos adquirindo pintos, ração e vitaminas. Este é o seu 5º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar seu negócio para satisfazer as necessidades dos seus clientes. O seu maior desafio é terminar a sua obra de residência.
texts.en:
Amandio was born in Namaacha in the province of Maputo. She is 31 years old. He lives with his partner and has three young children, two of whom go to school. He is also financially responsible for his parents, who live in Matola.
He has owned a business for more than four years, and he uses his income to cover household expenses. He will use this loan to increase the number of chickens he raises, buying chicks, feed, and vitamins. This is his fifth loan from Hluvuku.
In the future he hopes to expand his business to meet his customers' demand. His biggest challenge is to finish the construction on his home.

loans.use: to buy chicks, chicken feed, and vitamins.

loans.name: Leonel

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Xai-Xai Província de Gaza tem 27 anos de idade vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade dos quais 1 é que frequenta a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha como Segurança a mais de 3 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa e na sua obra. Solicita um empréstimo para dar continuidade a sua obra adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento, pedra, varões e outro que for necessário. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende realizar matrimónio e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
Leonel was born in Xai Xai in the province of Gaza. He is 27 years old. He lives with his partner and has two young children, one of whom goes to school. He is not financially responsible for anyone else.
He has been working as security guard for more than three years. He uses what he earns to pay for household expenses and construction costs. He will use this loan to continue the work on his home, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, stone, rebar, and anything else that is needed. This is his third loan from Hluvuku.
In the future he hopes to get married and be able to pay for his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, stone, rebar, and anything else that is needed.

loans.name: Hilario

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Inhambane tem 38 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de uma filha menor de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe que vive em Boane. 
Trabalha no Concelho Municipal como Técnico Profissional a mais de 5 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa e na obra. Solicita um empréstimo para dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento, varões e aros. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior e adquirir uma viatura
texts.en:
Hilario was born in the city of Inhambane. He is 38 years old and lives with his partner. They have a young daughter. He also takes care of his mother, who lives in Boane.
He has been working for the city as a technician for more than five years. He uses what he earns to pay for household expenses and construction costs. He will use this loan to continue the construction on his house, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and rebar. This is his second loan from Hluvuku.
His future goals are to continue his studies and purchase a vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, and beams.

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
Celeste tem 42 anos de idade, é casada, é negociante a mais de 5 anos, tem 3 filhos, frenquentando ensino primario, vive na casa própria, com o seu esposo e filhos, e não sustenta mais alguém.
O dinheiro do empréstimo sera aplicado para a compra de refrigerantes, fardos de roupa, para revender no mercado local.
No futuro pretende criar frangos, visto que tem um aviàrio em casa, faltando a implementação do projecto.
O seu principal desafio e de garantir o sustento escolar dos filhos, reembolsar o empréstimo sem cair em mora de modo a solicitar mais pedidos para lograr seus projectos.
texts.en:
Celeste is 42 years old and married. She has had her own business for more than five years. She has three children, all of whom are in elementary school. She lives with her family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else.
She will use the loan to buy soft drinks and used clothing to resell in the local market.
In the future she plans to raise chickens since she already has a coop at her house and only needs to get started.
Her main goal is to pay for her children's education and pay back this loan so she can request more and pursue her projects.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and used clothing to resell in the local market.

loans.name: Remigio

texts.pt:
Senhor Remígio é casado, tem cinco filhos dos quais dois estudam, frenquendo ensino técnico e secundário, vive em casa própria com a sua família a qual ele sustenta, trabalha como segurança a mais de quatro anos.
Com o montante financiado vai comprar cimento, areia, pedra, blocos para dar a continuidade a construção da sua casa visto que a mesma não está concluida. 
No futuro espera concluir a construção da sua casa, mobiliar, e ampliar o seu negócio conquistando mais clientes.
Nao teve oportunidade de estudar para mais alêm, assim sendo desafia para que os seus filhos possam alcançar um bom nível de escolaridade, visto que a formação garante o futuro, espera ser bom cliente de modo a garantir financiamentos subsequentes e consenquentimente lograr seus projectos.
texts.en:
Remígio is married and has five children, two of whom are in vocational and high school. He lives with his family in a home they own. He has been working as a security guard for more than four years.
He will use this loan to buy cement, sand, stone, and cinder blocks to continue the construction on his house, which remains unfinished.
In the future he hopes to finish and furnish his home and expand his business to attract more customers.
He was not able to go to school, so he is determined to give his children the chance to pursue their studies to guarantee their future. He will pay off his loan promptly so that he can request additional funding and accomplish his goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, stone, and cinder blocks to continue the construction on his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits, sugar, staple foods, and snacks.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.pt:
O Sr Rafael tem 48 anos de idade junto com a esposa a sua equerda, casado, pai de cinco filhos dos quais quatro estão na sua respnsabilidade e um está no lar. Cria frangos e faz negócio com a sua esposa no quintal da sua casa. O casal, neste momento tem uma capoeira com a capacidade de quinhentos pintos e também explora uma mercearia  que em parte está em obra e com poucos produtos, porém,  com o emprástimo pretende comprar  frangos e insumos  para posterior  revenda em sua casa.
 seu maior sonho é ser maior fornecedor de frangos na Matola-rio e zonas afins e a dificuldade prende-se pela falta de dinheiro para a realização do seu sonho.
texts.en:
Rafael is 48 years old. He is married and has five children, four of whom are still living at home while one is independent. He and his wife raise chickens and sell them on their property. He has a chicken coop with room for five hundred chicks, and he has also set up a grocery store, which at the moment is still under construction and carries very little merchandise. With this loan he intends to buy chickens and products to resell at home.
His dream is to become the largest poultry seller in Matola-rio and the surrounding area. His biggest challenge is the lack of funds to carry out his dream.

loans.use: to buy chickens and products to resell at home.

loans.name: Chakarika Group

texts.en:
Hadija is a business woman in her mid thirties and has three school-aged kids. For one year now, she runs a mama lishe (cafe) business selling breakfast and lunch foods. Hadija works from 5:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. daily and is able to realize a fair monthly profit.

This is her first credit request from Kiva partner's Tujijenge Tanzania to be apportioned among Chakarika, a ten-member group. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

Hadija will invest her portion of the loan to buy food cooking ingredients and to start selling soft drinks. Her desires are to build a house and grow her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy food cooking ingredients and to start selling soft drinks.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.pt:
Tem 52 anos de idade, viúva e mãe de 4 filhos maiores de idade e que já vivem cada um em sua casa e ajudam a ela nas despesas do dia-a-dia, vive na casa própria à base de negocio e actualmente trabalha como cozinheira para uns trabalhadores de uma empresa de construções e tem um rendimento que duplica o salário mínimo fixado no pais e esta a repetir o crédito pela 2ªvez.
Com o mesmo, pretende comprar material de construção como: cimento, barrotes e chapas de zinco, para dar continuidade à construção de sua casa que acabou de iniciar e que isso é a sua maior esperança.
O seu maior desafio, é o facto do negócio não sair sempre bem e sendo o seu emprego não muito seguro.
texts.en:
Fatima is 52 years old. She is a widow and has four adult children who live at home and help her with everyday expenses. She lives in her own home thanks to her business preparing meals for the workers at a construction company. Her income is double the national minimum wage. This will be her second loan with Hluvuku.
She will use it to buy construction materials such as cement, beams, and sheet metal to continue the construction on her new house, which is her biggest dream.
Her biggest challenge is the fact that her business sometimes flags and is not very reliable.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement, beams, and sheet metal to continue the construction on her new house.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Catalina works hard to support her family.

She has a banana vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Catalina is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more bananas to sell to her customers for her banana vending business.

Catalina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell to her customers

loans.name: Beverlyn

texts.en:
Beverlyn is 55 years old and has four children. Beverlyn is married and one of her children is still in school.

Beverlyn is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Beverlyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Beverlyn has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed 16 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Beverlyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Cecilia is 49 years old and her two children are in school.

Cecilia has a sand and gravel selling business in the Philippines. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional tons of sand and gravel to sell.

Cecilia has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional tons of sand and gravel to sell

loans.name: Conception

texts.en:
Conception is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a banana and coconut vending business in the Philippines.  She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy more bananas and coconuts to sell to her customers for her vending business.

Conception has been in this business for 13 years. She also earns more income from food vending. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Conception has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more bananas and coconuts to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Otinkorang Group

texts.en:
These ladies are part of the group called Otinkorang and are three women who are all merchants and live in the same neighborhood. They sell tomatoes, onion, pepper, garden eggs, rice, salted fish, charcoal, cloth, and materials. 

Joyce, age 45, is the group's representative. She's married and the mother of two children. She's a merchant with more than eight years of experience in the field. She displays her products at her residence and sells quality products, which is her strength. With this loan, she intends to buy more tomatoes, onions, peppers, garden eggs, rice, and salted fish and sell them to customers. Her profits enable her to save money with ID-Ghana, pay her children school fees, and also take care of her household expenses. She and the other members will need a total amount of GHS 5,000 in their eight loan cycle to expand their businesses. They will hold each other responsible for the repayment of the loan.

loans.use: To buy more tomatoes, onions, peppers, garden eggs, rice, and salted fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Issa

texts.en: Issa is 26 years old. He is married with one child who is 7 months old, and does not yet go to school. He sells clothes and has been working in a business for the past four years. With the loan, he would like to buy more shirts and t-shirts to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and renovate his house.

loans.use: to buy more shirts and t-shirts to sell.

loans.name: Yanisai

texts.en:
Yanisai took advantage of the skills that she gained at school and started her own business. She is 35 years old, married and has two children. Yanisai operates a successful business sewing and selling uniforms in her area of Wedza District, Zimbabwe. 

Yanisai is a volunteer community activist who campaigns for the economic independence of young women. She is also a Camfed Learner Guide who volunteers her time teaching students life skills. 

With the Kiva loan, Yanisai would like to purchase material, thread and other sewing supplies so that she can produce even more uniforms and other clothing items.

loans.use: To purchase more sewing materials

loans.name: Janeth

texts.en:
Janeth is nothing short of a visionary dairy farmer who is based in the outskirts of Litein town, in the South Rift region of Kenya. Her house, covered with corrugated iron sheet, is at the centre of a compound within her luxuriant five acre farm. She started farming in the year 1999. Today, she makes money from selling milk, offering motorcycle transportation services and a side hustle that involves the selling of shoes and clothes. However, surrounded by fresh air, wide open space, and peaceful, natural sounds, she cherishes every minute spent with her cows.
 
Janeth is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to construct a cow barn and buy a motorcycle that will help with the transportation of goods and people. The barn will help improve animal health, hygiene and nutrition. The introduction of zero-grazing will help her to improve dairy management, utilize space in her farm, use pasture more efficiently and ration feed.
 
In rural towns of Kenya, Indian motorcycles are in vogue. Farmers, like Janeth, use the roadster bicycles to transport passengers and farm goods to and from the market. They are suited for areas with poor road networks which are inaccessible by cars. They are also very cheap to acquire and maintain. 

Invest in Janeth's future and you won't regret it. She is full of promise. So far, she has managed to send her children to standard private schools with her blood, sweat, and tears. Imagine what she will do with your lending?

loans.use: to construct a cow barn and purchase a motorcycle for produce transportation.

loans.name: Jovie

texts.en:
Jovie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell dry goods business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 16,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more stocks like shoes, t-shirts, blouses, etc. to sell for her dry goods business.
Jovie has been in this business for 10 years. She earns additional income from food vending.

Jovie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks like shoes, t-shirts, blouses, etc. to sell

loans.name: Abelardo

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de mecanica,el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de mecanica.El socios solicita el crédito para comprar herramientas como motores para arreglar los carros.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues to run his mechanics business and wants to get ahead through this business.  His dream is to expand his business.  He is asking for this loan to buy equipment such as engines to repair cars with.

He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Clarah

texts.en:
For the last 10 years, Clara has been operating a pharmacy business. At the same time, she owns rental houses and earns a monthly income of  KES 60,000. She is 30 years old and married to Dickson. She is blessed with three school-going children. 

She has applied for second loan of 70,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya and intends to use the loan amount to pay school fees for her children.

Clara will use the anticipated profits to provide for the family basic needs. She hopes to grow her business and school for dressmaking.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en:
Innocent is 31 years old. He is married with 2 children who are between 2 years and 8 months old. He sells clothes and has been running his business for the past 4 years. His children do not yet go to school.

After getting his loan, he would like to buy more shirts and trousers to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and to pay future school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more shirts and trousers to sell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 52 years old, married, and together with her spouse they have been blessed with 4 children who are all grown up. She runs a grocery business and has been in this business for 32 years.

Susan will use this loan to buy more stock of grocery to sell. These include potatoes, carrots, and vegetables. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business. 

This is Susan's third loan and she has paid her previous loans successfully. In the future, she hopes to grow her business and be successful.

loans.use: To buy more stock of grocery to sell.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
"Eighty percent of Kenyans are farmers, and by that, I mean that people who make a living off of the land, and 80 percent of the food that people eat comes from people who sell in the rural marketplace,” says Margaret, a 57-year-old mixed farmer based in Ibencho, a remote village in the Kisii area of Kenya. 

She is a mother of five school-going children whom she truly loves and greatly adores. Margaret always describes her upbringing as challenging, and that is why she is doing everything in her power to provide a good foundation for her children and to be able to secure their future. Margaret has been farming for over 15 years. Over the years, she has gained much experience and is now considered one of the best farmers in her village because of the immense knowledge that she possesses. Margaret passionately loves dairy farming and she has even nicknamed one of her cows “Onyango” (a person’s name).

Since she has excess dairy food and enough space on her land, Margaret has always wanted to buy another dairy cow, but the challenge that she has been facing is lack of finances. That is why Juhudi Kilimo is partnering with Kiva and Kiva lenders to help aspiring women like Margret to turn their dreams into reality. Margaret believes that the loan will help her to satisfy the milk demand in her area and, through the accumulated profits, she will be able to realize her dream of developing her business into a large enterprise. 

Many women in Kenya are responsible for not only producing food, but also feeding their family. Margaret, being a hardworking farmer, wants to provide all of the basic needs that her children and parents require. Margaret is very disciplined with her finances and she knows that, with the accumulated profits, she will be able to fully repay her loan.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Pamela M

texts.en: Pamela is a 20-year-old, married mother of one from Wedza District, Zimbabwe. She is a devoted entrepreneur who runs a grocery stall at her local market selling tea bags, rice, cooking oil, washing powder, bath soap and sugar. She is requesting a Kiva loan to make bulk purchases of sugar, salt, candles, washing bars, toothpaste and flour. Pamela’s family helps to manage the business. She intends to use the profits to continue her education and to take care of her child’s education. When she is not at her stall you will find her at her local secondary school counseling young girls and boys. She also volunteers as a Camfed Learner Guide teaching student’s life skills.

loans.use: to purchase items in bulk to increase her stock.

loans.name: Grupo San Miguelito 4 Group

texts.es:
Mujeres emprendedoras no hacen falta en el país de la eterna primavera que es Guatemala donde la mujer forma parte importante en los campos laborales, tal es el caso de Pascuala de 36 años de edad que tiene 2 hijo los cuales son estudiantes en la escuela de su comunidad. (Pascuala es la que se encuentra de 1ra de izquierda a derecha de la fila que están paradas en la fotografía)

La actividad que ella desempeña con tanto orgullo es la producción de banano en los campos fértiles de su comunidad dicho trabajo lo ha venido realizando desde hace 20 años y genera buena ganancia para la economía de su familia ya que es la herencia que su padre le pudo dejar para que ella tenga una calidad de vida mejor en el futuro.

El uso respectivo que Pascuala le dará al préstamo que ella solicita es para el mantenimiento de banano  para que produzcan sus frutos y sean llevados en los mercados de la comunidad para su respectiva venta.
